unnormalised: Interesting moves in the transfer window! Wonder if Mohun Bagan's new acquisitions will gel as well as expected. Real test will be the Durand Cup, starting August 5th. East Bengal also needs to bolster their defense, especially after conceding so many goals last season. Remember the "Chak De! India" spirit - team cohesion matters! The Rs. 2 Crore signing needs to justify his price tag. Let's see if this new strategy of investing in young Indian talent pays off in the long run. Will these transfers help India qualify for the next FIFA World Cup?
